channel.title: Yangsiyu Lu, Jiao Xiong on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Yangsiyu Lu, Jiao Xiong on Universal

item.title: International Society for Energy Transition Studies (ISETS)
item.description:
Lu Yangsiyu and PhD student Xiong Jiao attended the annual meeting of the International Energy Transition Association.

In the Urban Construction Technology themed session, Dr. Yangsiyu Lu, assistant professor of CNCC trust at HKUST(GZ), was invited to be a guest speaker and share her latest research results on energy infrastructure transition.
